Room.Name: Locked Grate
Room.ShortDescription: You are in an old aquaduct, near a locked grate where the water disappears.
Room.LongDescription: The stream gurgles and runs through the ancient iron grate, swirling away out of sight. This must be at a point somewhere underneath the ruined temple in the jungle above. The brickwork lining the old tunnel is crumbled and in a heap here, almost like it had been destroyed by an earthquake. If you don't have a key to the grate the only exit from here is to the northwest.
